"Armor":
"As you take on more difficult quests, enemies with high attack power will begin to appear.

There are several available measures that you can take to increase your ability to survive strong attacks.
・Equip armor with Special Abilities like Body, React, Mind and the various Resists
・Grind the armor itself to increase its DEF values
・Raise your Mag in a way that increases its DEF values"
"You can enhance armor in the Item Lab, located in the Shop Area. If you are struggling, try improving your equipment."
